issue.title: Relation based on resource type has changed behaviour
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

A relation based on a resource type (Contact) with a 1..1 cardinality is no more displayed by default. Now there is a "+" to add a new contact.
If I don't add a contact, I can validate my metadata. I should not be able to do it. Metadata contact is a mandatory field.
